channel.title: pipe line on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in pipe line on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Pipeline Road Run
item.description: There was a discussion in the running group to practice hill-run before upcoming Hyderabad run which I am trying to be a regular member. Normally the “numero uno” destination for hill training around Bangalore is Nandi Hill ; which is 60KM north of the city. Have already run Nandi hills few times and yes Nandi is grueling specially the last 3 KM. Nandi run is 15KM in total where you go 7.
